name: Swedish Sticky Chocolate Cake (Kladdkaka)
author: BRUTALPOETESSAN
summary: This is a Swedish recipe for Kladdkaka (Sticky Chocolate Cake), a rich, and gooey chocolate cake. It should serve 8 but at our house it often serves only 2...
directions: Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
Sift together the flour, cocoa powder, and salt; set aside
Stir the eggs into the sugar until smooth
Add the flour mixture, and stir just until combined
Pour in the vanilla extract and butter; stir until well combined
Bake on the lower rack of the preheated oven for 35 minutes, or until the center has slightly set
Allow cake to cool for 1 hour in the pie plate
Serve warm, or refrigerate overnight and serve cold
